library.data

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • library.data.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LibraryData

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements LibraryData
    Represents a single library book.
    Author:
    Srikavin Ramkumar

      • Book

        public Book(Identifier identifier,
            java.lang.String name,
            java.lang.String author,
            java.lang.String isbn,
            BookStatus status,
            Patron currentPatron,
            java.time.Instant checkOutDate)
        Creates an instance of this class.
        Parameters:
        identifier - Identifier representing this object
        name - The title of the book
        author - The author's name
        isbn - The ISBN of this book
        status - The current status of this book
        checkOutDate - The checked out date of this book, can be null if it is not currently checked out
        currentPatron - The current patron holding this book
